title.rendered: Kainchi Dham Dunagiri Cave Patal Bhuvaneshwar Package

content.rendered:
Kainchi Dham Dunagiri Cave Patal Bhuvaneshwar Package

Home » India » Kainchi Dham Tours » Kainchi Dham Dunagiri Cave Patal Bhuvaneshwar Package

Tour Overview

The Kainchi Dham Mahavatar Cave Patal Bhuvaneshwar Package will take you to three of the most sacred Indian destinations.

You’ll first head to Kainchi Dham which is known for its spiritual aura and divine ambiance. The main temple is dedicated to Neem Karoli Baba whose teaching had a profound impact on the lives of thousands of people. You can meditate, seek the blessings of Neem Karoli Baba and attend Satsang. With this package, you’ll also get to explore Mahavatar Cave which is known to be the place where Kriya Yoga was initiated. The cave offers a serene environment to connect with yourself and meditate.

By booking this package you will also get to visit Patal Bhuvaneshwar, a limestone cave temple that enshrines Lord Shiva and 33 demigods. Limestone rock formations have led to the creation of various spectacular stalagmites and stalactite figures of various forms and hues. You should definitely visit this cave if you want to experience eternal power’s presence. Book the Kainchi Dham Mahavatar Cave Patal Bhuvaneshwar Package now to embark on a sacred journey that will transform your life forever.

Read more

Trip Highlights

  • Appreciate Patal Bhuvaneshwar’s intricate architecture.
  • Learn the profound philosophical teachings of Neem Karoli Baba at Kainchi Dham.
  • Learn about the origin of Kriya yoga at Cave Patal.

Tour Itinerary

Day 1 :Delhi to Kainchi Dham

You will start your journey with a hassle-free pickup from Delhi. After that you’ll embark on a picturesque road trip to Kainchi Dham, enjoying the serene views and picturesque landscapes along the way. After arriving at Kainchi Dham, you will check in to your hotel and relax for some time before heading to the Kainchi Dham temple that is dedicated to Neem Karoli Baba. Attend the evening Aarti for an uplifting experience. Afterward, you’ll head back to the hotel and have an overnight stay.

Day 2 :Kainchi Dham- Mahavatar Babaji Cave

Enjoy a delicious breakfast at your hotel and then get ready to head to Dwarahat. After reaching Dwarahat you will visit Mahavatar Babaji Cave where Lahiri Mahasaya was initiated into Kriya Yoga in 1861 by immortal Babaji. After exploring this spiritual retreat you’ll check in to your hotel and have a restful sleep.

Day 3 :Dwarahat- Patal Bhuvaneshwar

Relish a tasty breakfast in the morning and then you’ll embark on a sacred journey to Patal Bhuvaneshwar. This hidden pilgrimage center is dedicated to Lord Shiva and is renowned for its intricate architecture. You can discover hidden chambers and explore the intricate pathways for an adrenaline-pumping experience. Devotees can engage in rituals, prayer, and meditation to seek divine intervention. You’ll also visit the other popular attractions of Pithoragarh including Hat Kalika Temple and tea gardens. After that, you’ll head back to your hotel and have an overnight stay.

Day 4 :Patal Bhuvaneshwar- Delhi

After having a lip-smacking breakfast at your hotel you’ll complete your check-out formalities and embark on a scenic journey to Delhi. With this, your Kainchi Dham Mahavatar Cave Patal Bhuvaneshwar Package will come to an end.

Price Details

Tour Name Kainchi Dham Dunagiri Cave Patal Bhuvaneshwar Package
Duration 3 Nights / 4 Days
Destinations Delhi → Kainchi Dham → Mahavatar Babaji Cave → Dwarahat → Patal Bhuvaneshwar
Tour Price On Request

    Package Inclusions

    • Hotel accommodation.
    • Breakfast and dinner.
    • Transfers and sightseeing
    • Pick up and drop
    • Toll tax, parking, fuel and driving allowance

    Package Exclusions

    • GST @5%
    • Lunch and Snacks
    • Personal expenses such as laundry, phone calls, extra meals or snacks
    • Entry fee
    • Travel and medical Insurance
    • Anything not mentioned under Package Inclusions.

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Q.What are the naturally formed places you can visit in Patal Bhuvaneshwar?

    Ans.The naturally formed places you can visit in Patal Bhuvaneshwar include Kali’s tongue, Ganesha’s human head, a naturally formed Shiva lingam, Shesha’s idol, Kali Yuga’s sculpture and replica idols of Kedarnath, Badrinath and Amarnath.

    Q.What is the best time to visit Kainchi Dham?

    Ans.September to November and March to June are the best times to visit Kainchi Dham as the weather remains pleasant and there is very little chance of rainfall making outdoor exploration worry-free.

    Q.What are the places to visit in Kainchi Dham?

    Ans.The famous attractions to visit in Kainchi Dham include Kainchi Dham Ashram which is dedicated to Neem Karoli Baba, and Hanuman Temple which was established by Neem Karoli Baba.

    Q.What prominence does the Mahavatar Babaji Cave hold?

    Ans.The Mahavatar Babaji Cave is believed to be Mahavatar Babaji’s meditation retreat, a legendary yogi in Hinduism. Followers of Kriya Yoga believe it to be a sacred site, as Babaji introduced this transformative practice over here to the world. The cave symbolizes spiritual enlightenment and divine presence, drawing devotees and seekers.

    Q.When was Patal Bhuvaneshwar established?

    Ans.Patal Bhuvaneshwar is considered to be as old as the Earth itself. In "Skanda Purana’s" 103 chapter of Manaskhand it has been mentioned. Rituparna" of the Surya Dynasty was the first human who entered the cave during the Treta Yuga.
